name: tum-live
description: Backend of TUMs live streaming service

scripts.postinstall: npx tsc && npx google-closure-compiler -O BUNDLE --js 'web/assets/ts-dist-temp/*.js' --js_output_file web/assets/ts-dist/main.min.js && rm -rf web/assets/ts-dist-temp && npx tailwindcss build -o ./web/assets/css-dist/main.css

author: Joscha Henningsen
